t_photo_series_character::text_card_0::t: This is a portrait series template. A series is a set of similar images designed to illustrate a comparative point. Images in a series should be stylistically similar to further illustrate the comparison.
t_photo_series_character::clip_card_0::g: Photograph a person who illustrates the core idea of your story.
t_photo_series_character::clip_card_4::g: Replicate the composition with a different person.
t_photo_series_character::clip_card_3::g: Replicate the composition with a different person.
t_photo_series_character::title: Series - Portraits
t_photo_series_character::clip_card_1::g: Replicate the composition of the first photo with another person.
t_photo_series_character::clip_card_2::g: Replicate the composition with a different person.
